value.name: 2 die in separate officer-involved shootings in Colorado
value.description: On Friday night, a Larimer County deputy shot Chet Knuppel, 23, of Fort Collins, while investigating a crash involving a stolen vehicle between Fort Collins and Loveland, the coroner said.

value.name: 2 victims in Colorado officer-involved shootings identified
value.description: On Friday night, a Larimer County sheriff’s deputy shot Chet Knuppel, 23, of Fort Collins, while investigating a crash involving a stolen vehicle between Fort Collins and Loveland, the coroner said.

value.name: 2 die in separate officer-involved shootings in Colorado
value.description: On Friday night, a Larimer County deputy shot Chet Knuppel, 23, of Fort Collins, while investigating a crash involving a stolen vehicle between Fort Collins and Loveland, the coroner said.
